title: Toshiba e-STUDIO2518A Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Toshiba e-STUDIO2518A printers. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the authentication mechanism. The issue results from improper session management. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
addtionnal_details: Toshiba has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.toshibatec.com/information/20240531_01.html
timeline:
2024-02-14 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-06-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Zhenhua Huang from trendmicro, Harry Zhang from trendmicro, Minmin Li
